brandingbrand.name: BrandingBrand.com
brandingbrand.description: Branding Brand leverages node.js to power commerce for big companies like Costco, Wayfair, AE, +200 other high-profile retailers.

dash.name: Dash
dash.description: Dash is realtime dashboard software backed by node. We're looking for interns to help build the future of realtime data sharing.

ftlabs.name: FTLabs
ftlabs.description: The Financial Times is a global news organisation. FT Labs has award-winning HTML5 expertise and runs respected open source projects.

godaddy.name: GoDaddy
godaddy.description: At GoDaddy we're crazy about JavaScript. If you're into Node.js, NoSQL, Open Source and fun then we're into you. Come join us!

help.name: Help.com
help.description: Help.com just raised $6 million and is hiring talented Node.js engineers in Austin to build our platform.

hired.name: Hired
hired.description: Hired is a candidate-focused marketplace for software devs. Our aim is to deliver a premier experience to job seekers everywhere.

jut.name: Jut
jut.description: Jut, Inc. is looking for node.js developers to join our Open Source, early stage Big Data company in San Francisco. Clean code base, amazingly successful founders - check us out.

lob.name: lob.com
lob.description: Lob.com is looking for node.js engineers who are passionate about building APIs to join our team in San Francisco.

mulesoft.name: MuleSoft
mulesoft.description: Mulesoft is looking for node.js Developers to join our smart and talented team of Core Services engineers in San Francisco.

newscred.name: NewsCred
newscred.description: We are the fastest growing start up in NYC and are looking to expand our team of engineers to include: Automation, Sr Search, Full Stack and Javascript Engineers.

nutanix.name: Nutanix
nutanix.description: Nutanix is one of the fastest growing infrastructure companies of all time and is looking for passionate JS engineers to expand our web team!

polyvore.name: Polyvore
polyvore.description: Polyvore is a profitable startup in Mountain View. Our product pushes JS to its limits, and we're looking for awesome Node.js engineers!

uber.name: UBER
uber.description: UBER has the largest real time, distributed system built in Node.js and needs passionate contributors to scale our team to new heights.

voxer.name: Voxer
voxer.description: Come join us at Voxer & work on a powerful push-to-talk service! We are looking for node.js Eng, iOS/Android Eng, Ops Eng, & more!
